original_text:
Woe to those who decree iniquitous decrees,
    and the writers who keep writing oppression,
korean_text: 불의한 법령을 만들며 불의한 말을 기록하며

sentences.original_text: Woe to those who decree iniquitous decrees
sentences.korean_translation: 불의한 법령을 제정하는 자들에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: and the writers who keep writing oppression,
